languages.text: "Чужим? Я имею право на это имя. Оно — мое скромное наследство, доставшееся от архимагоса Амарната. Отказаться от него значило бы предать его идеи. Благословенный Амарнат учил, что Цикл должен быть прерван, и я, похоже, стал его лучшим учеником. Теперь я стремлюсь знать все, постигать все, как завещал Омниссия".

"Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."
languages.original_text: "Чужим? Я имею право на это имя. Оно — мое скромное наследство, доставшееся от архимагоса Амарната. Отказаться от него значило бы предать его идеи. Благословенный Амарнат учил, что Цикл должен быть прерван, и я, похоже, стал его лучшим учеником. Теперь я стремлюсь знать все, постигать все, как завещал Омниссия".

languages.text: 「もう一人？私にはこの名を名乗る権利がある。大賢人アマルナトから授かった、私のささやかな遺産だ。それを放棄することは、彼の考えを裏切ることになる。祝福されしアマルナトは、サイクルを途絶えさせねばならぬと教えてくれた。今、私はすべてを知り、すべてを理解することを志している。万機神の意志のままに」
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."

traits.locale_text: 「もう一人？私にはこの名を名乗る権利がある。大賢人アマルナトから授かった、私のささやかな遺産だ。それを放棄することは、彼の考えを裏切ることになる。祝福されしアマルナトは、サイクルを途絶えさせねばならぬと教えてくれた。今、私はすべてを知り、すべてを理解することを志している。万機神の意志のままに」

languages.text: “盗用别人的名字？我有权使用这个名字，这是属于我的卑微遗产，是我从阿玛纳特大贤者那里得到的。如果放弃了这个名字，就等同于背叛了他的理念。蒙福者阿玛纳特教导我们，循环必须终止，而我似乎成为了他最出色的学徒。如今我渴望知晓一切，理解一切，这正是欧姆尼塞亚的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."

traits.locale_text: “盗用别人的名字？我有权使用这个名字，这是属于我的卑微遗产，是我从阿玛纳特大贤者那里得到的。如果放弃了这个名字，就等同于背叛了他的理念。蒙福者阿玛纳特教导我们，循环必须终止，而我似乎成为了他最出色的学徒。如今我渴望知晓一切，理解一切，这正是欧姆尼塞亚的旨意。”

languages.text: « Le nom d'un autre ? J'ai parfaitement le droit de porter ce nom. C'est mon héritage, reçu de l'archimagos Amarnat lui-même. Y renoncer serait trahir ses idées. Amarnat le béni nous a enseigné que le Cycle doit être interrompu, et il semblerait que je sois devenu l'un de ses meilleurs élèves. Désormais j'aspire à tout savoir et à tout comprendre, car telle est la volonté de l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."

traits.locale_text: « Le nom d'un autre ? J'ai parfaitement le droit de porter ce nom. C'est mon héritage, reçu de l'archimagos Amarnat lui-même. Y renoncer serait trahir ses idées. Amarnat le béni nous a enseigné que le Cycle doit être interrompu, et il semblerait que je sois devenu l'un de ses meilleurs élèves. Désormais j'aspire à tout savoir et à tout comprendre, car telle est la volonté de l'Omnimessie. »

languages.text: «¿Ajeno? Tengo el derecho a usar este apellido. Es mi humilde herencia, recibida del Archimagos Amarnat. Renunciar a él sería traicionar sus ideales. El bendito Amarnat nos enseñó que el Ciclo debe interrumpirse, y parece que soy su mejor discípulo. Ahora aspiro a saberlo todo y comprenderlo todo, como dicta el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ajeno? Tengo el derecho a usar este apellido. Es mi humilde herencia, recibida del Archimagos Amarnat. Renunciar a él sería traicionar sus ideales. El bendito Amarnat nos enseñó que el Ciclo debe interrumpirse, y parece que soy su mejor discípulo. Ahora aspiro a saberlo todo y comprenderlo todo, como dicta el Omnissiah».

languages.text: "Schon wieder? Ich habe das Recht, diesen Namen zu tragen. Es ist mein demütiges Erbe, das ich von Erzmagos Amarnat erhalten habe. Es abzulehnen wäre ein Verrat an seinen Ideen. Der gesegnete Amarnat hat uns gelehrt, dass der Zyklus durchbrochen werden muss, und ich bin offenbar zu seinem besten Schüler geworden. Nun strebe ich danach, alles zu wissen, alles zu begreifen, wie es der Wille des Omnissiah ist."
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."

traits.locale_text: "Schon wieder? Ich habe das Recht, diesen Namen zu tragen. Es ist mein demütiges Erbe, das ich von Erzmagos Amarnat erhalten habe. Es abzulehnen wäre ein Verrat an seinen Ideen. Nun strebe ich danach, alles zu wissen, alles zu begreifen, wie es der Wille des Omnissiah ist."

languages.text: "Başka biri mi? Bu ismi taşımaya hakkım var. Başmagos Amarnat'tan aldığım mirastır. Onu bir kenara atmak, onun fikirlerine ihanet etmek demektir. Kutsanmış Amarnat bize Döngü'nün süreğinin bozulması gerektiğini öğretti ve görünen o ki ben de onun en iyi öğrencisiymişim. Artık her şeyi bilmeyi, her şeyin farkında olmayı arzuluyorum. Hermesih'in dileği budur."
languages.original_text: "Another? I have the right to bear this name. It is my humble inheritance, which I received from Archmagos Amarnat. To renounce it is to betray his ideas. The blessed Amarnat taught us that the Cycle must be discontinued, and it seems I have become his best student. Now I aspire to know all, comprehend all, as is the Omnissiah's will."
